summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The City Board of Adjustment (Panel C) will convene on March 17, 2025, at Dallas City Hall for a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting aims to address various zoning and adjustment requests from residents and stakeholders.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes a staff presentation, public testimony, and a review of the case docket, which consists of uncontested items, holdover cases, and individual cases requiring decisions.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include requests for special exceptions to fence height regulations at two locations (4259 Park Lane and 1637 Sylvan Avenue), a variance to off-street parking regulations at 114 W. 7th Street, and a variance to front-yard setback regulations at 2632 Pennsylvania Avenue. Additionally, there is a request to terminate deed restrictions at 5114 McKinney Avenue. Holdover items include landscaping regulation exceptions at two sites on Wheatland Road and Lancaster Road, while an individual case involves a side-yard setback variance at 5323 Miller Avenue.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approvals for the various applications presented, including special exceptions and variances. The meeting will also include the approval of minutes from the previous meeting held on February 20, 2025. Public participation is encouraged, with registration required for those wishing to speak.
